description.value:
You curl into a posture that splays out your bone spines. You gain a +1 circumstance to AC until the start of your next turn.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feat-effects.Item.Effect: Bristle]

Special If you have the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Barbed Quills] reaction or a quills unarmed attack, each gains a +1 circumstance bonus to damage rolls until the start of your next turn.

publication.title: Pathfinder Lost Omens: The Mwangi Expanse
